name: Wild Wolf
description: Wild Wolf is a survival-based game about a wolf's life struggle. You have to face the hunter by carrying the responsibility of the wolf.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 @ 3.30GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 500 Series 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 6000 Series 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Optimization studies are ongoing.
